column4: I got a netgear card working using ndiswarapper, might be a different card though, and this was on puppy linux.
I think I used these drivers: http://www.murga-linux.com/puppy/viewtopic.php?p=290470#290470 along with ndiswrapper.
but again, that might well be a completely different make than your card.
ah, well then the issue might be otherwise.
